products.title: Sahara PVC Blackout White Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Sahara PVC Blackout White Electric Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £145.44 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Sahara PVC blackout range is available in two classic and neutral tones that are ideal for wet or heat based environments. 
 
This, chil-safe, hard-wearing, white PVC Electric roller blind is ideal for areas where it is exposed to heat or wet as it is flame retardant and waterproof. The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for those difficult to reach windows
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2148 Fabric Colour: White Material: Fiberglass core laminated with PVC layered coating Lining: Pattern Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
